name: Berries and Fried Meat
effect:
Revives the selected character.
Restores 250–550 HP.
description: Fried meat accompanied by mashed potatoes. The meat is thinly sliced, fried, then stewed, before being laid atop a bed of mashed potatoes. Usually eaten with crushed berries. Nutritious and filling!

suspicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 250 HP.
suspicious.description: Fried meat accompanied by mashed potatoes. The meat looks cooked but carries a strong taste of blood. If one can get past the idea of eating it raw, the flavor itself isn't actually all that bad...

normal.effect: Revives a character and restores 400 HP.
normal.description: Fried meat accompanied by mashed potatoes. The meat is thinly sliced, fried, then stewed, before being laid atop a bed of mashed potatoes. Usually eaten with crushed berries. Nutritious and filling!

delicious.effect: Revives a character and restores 550 HP.
delicious.description: Fried meat accompanied by mashed potatoes. The marbled meat is savory and flavorful. When paired with the natural sweetness of the berries, it feels like your tongue is wandering through the wilderness — full of delight and healing for the soul.
